title: GLASapalooza: Celebrating GLAS Achievement and Our Graduating Minors | UIC Today
contents: Skip to main content      Updated: May 01, 2020 at 11:42 AM         Today      Submit       Campus News  Academics & Research  Events  Resources   Current Student Resources  Faculty & Staff Resources  Photography/Video  Social Media Account Request Form  UIC Social Media Guidelines and Best Practices    COVID-19   Frequently Asked Questions  What you need to know about COVID-19  Support for the UIC community (COVID-19)  Teaching, learning and working resources  In the News: COVID-19    Contact   Communicating On Campus  Sending Announcements / DDDH  UIC Social Media Directory          GLASapalooza: Celebrating GLAS Achievement and Our Graduating Minors   Date / Time  May 11, 2020  4:00 pm - 5:00 pm     Categories   Special event       You are cordially invited to attend a virtual celebration for our graduating GLAS minors on Monday, May 11, 4-5pm  Join us for a virtual hour honoring the fierce work of GLAS and recognizing our graduates. Enjoy inspiring slideshows, live sitar and tabla music, and the warm camaraderie of the GLAS community.  Registration required by Saturday, May 9th by 11:59pm at this link: https:// forms .gle/5vqkfCZkRphGwSvR6  UIC students, faculty, and staff must use their UIC email addresses. For security and safety, attendees without a UIC email address are limited to guests of graduating GLAS minors or GLAS alums.  A unique event link to the webinar will be emailed to participants at the email address provided during registration the morning of the event.  CART live captioning will be available.  To request other accessibility needs by May 4, or for more information, please contact Karen Su at karensu@uic.edu.
